Mutual Fund investments are subject to market risks, read all scheme related documents carefully.

12

360 ONE LIQUID FUND

(An open‐ended liquid scheme. A relatively low interest rate risk and moderate credit risk)
To provide liquidity with reasonable returns
commensurate with low risk through a portfolio of
money market and debt securities with residual
maturity of up to 91 days. However, there can be
no assurance that the investment objective of the
scheme will be achieved.
Mr. Mody has over 20 years of work experience in
the Fixed Income market.
^As of May 31, 2025
^As of May 31, 2025
^As of May 31, 2025

THIS PRODUCT IS SUITABLE FOR INVESTORS WHO ARE SEEKING*
• Income over short term horizon
• Investments in money market and short term debt instruments, with
maturity not exceeding 91 days
*Investors should consult their financial advisers if in doubt about
whether the product is suitable for them.
##With effect from November 05, 2018, Triparty Repo has
replaced CBLOs for all schemes with provisions to invest in CBLO.
